name: Bomb Catcher II - Mattel Aquarius 4K 8K 16K
description:
In order to play Bomb Catcher II as a digital download, you will need the Micro Expander fitted to your Aquarius. There are 3 different download files, that correspond with the version that you wish to play.  4K, 8K and 16K. The 4K ROM is for an unexpanded Aquarius, the 8K ROM is for an Aquarius with the 4K ram pack fitted, and the 16K ROM is for the 16K Aquarius.

You must protect earths defences from the Alien attack. The defence shield is failing, and you must use your AAG Bomb Catcher vehicle to catch the bombs before they can do any damage. If you do catch the bomb, the energy will be extracted and transferred back in to the shield matrix. How long can you survive?
